AT.name: Little Inferno
AT.description: Gratulationen zu deinem neuen Little Inferno Entertainment Fireplace! Wirf deine Spielsachen in das Feuer und spiel mit ihnen, während sie brennen. Halte dich warm da drinnen. Es schneit schon, seit man sich erinnern kann! Verbrenne Holzscheite, schreiende Roboter, Kreditkarten, Batterien, explodierende Fische, instabile nukleare Geräte und winzige Galaxien. Ein Abenteuer, das fast vollständig vor einem Kamin stattfindet – ein Abenteuer über den Blick raus raus raus aus dem Kamin und die kalte Welt auf der anderen Seite der Wand. - Von den Erschaffern von World of Goo und Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure - 100% Indie – erschaffen von drei Männern, kein Büro, kein Publisher, keine Finanzierung - Verzichtet auf kostenpflichtige Extras, Spam, Kaufzwang oder Werbung jeder Art. Nur das Spiel.

AU.name: Little Inferno
AU.description: "A beautiful masterpiece", "inventive, moving and unrelentingly funny", "a deft statement on games and how we play them" - Little Inferno is an unusual game filled with surprise and wonder, and even better the less you know about it before playing. Congratulations on your new Little Inferno Entertainment Fireplace! Throw your toys into your fire, and play with them as they burn. Stay warm in there. It's been snowing for as long as anyone can remember! Burn flaming logs, screaming robots, credit cards, batteries, exploding fish, unstable nuclear devices and tiny galaxies. An adventure that takes place almost entirely in front of a fireplace - about looking up up up out of the chimney, and the cold world just on the other side of the wall. - From the designers of World of Goo and Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure. - 100% indie - made by three guys with no office, no publishers and no funding. - IAP free - no spam, upselling or ads of any sort. Just the game.

An adventure that takes place almost entirely in front of a fireplace - about looking up up up out of the chimney, and the cold world just on the other side of the wall. - From the designers of World of Goo and Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure. - 100% indie - made by three guys with no office, no publishers and no funding. - IAP free - no spam, upselling or ads of any sort. Just the game.

BE.name: Little Inferno
BE.description: Félicitations pour l'achat de votre Foyer de divertissement Little Inferno ! Jetez vos jouets dans le feu et jouez avec eux pendant qu'ils brûlent. Restez bien au chaud à l'intérieur. Aussi loin que l'on se souvienne, il neige dehors ! Brûlez des bûches, des robots hurlants, des cartes de crédit, des piles, des poissons explosifs, des dispositifs nucléaires instables, et des galaxies miniatures. Une aventure prenant place presque entièrement devant une cheminée - en regardant là-haut là-haut là-haut par le conduit, tandis qu'un monde gelé se trouve juste de l'autre côté du mur. - Par les créateurs de "World of Goo" et de "Henry Hatsworth : l'Incroyable Expédition" - 100% indé - créé par 3 personnes, sans bureau, sans éditeur, sans financement - Pas de frais caché - aucun pourriel, compte privilégié, ou publicité, de quelque sorte que ce soit. Uniquement le jeu.

ES.name: Little Inferno
ES.description: ¡Felicidades por la adquisición de tu flamante Chimenea Interactiva Little Inferno! Echa tus juguetes al fuego y juega con ellos mientras arden. Quédate en casa calentito. Ya nadie recuerda cuánto tiempo lleva nevando... Quema leña, robots, tarjetas de crédito, pilas, peces, globos, peces globo, artefactos nucleares inestables y galaxias diminutas. Esta aventura, que tiene lugar casi íntegramente delante de una chimenea, trata en realidad de lo que hay chimenea arriba, arriba, arriba, y del mundo que se congela al otro lado del muro. - De los diseñadores de "World of Goo" y "Henry Hatsworth en la aventura rompecabezas" - 100% independiente: hecho por tres tipos, sin oficina ni distribuidora ni financiación - Libre de In-App-Purchases (compras desde la aplicación): simplemente el juego, sin spam, anuncios ni contenido adicional o expansiones de pago

IT.name: Little Inferno
IT.description: Congratulazioni per il tuo nuovo Camino Interattivo Little Inferno! Getta i tuoi giocattoli nel fuoco e gioca con questi mentre bruciano. Mi raccomando, resta al calduccio! Fuori sta nevicando e nessuno sa più da quanto... Brucia i tronchetti di legno, i robot urlanti, le carte di credito, le batterie, i pesci esplosivi, i dispositivi nucleari instabili e le minuscole galassie. In quest’avventura, che si svolgerà quasi solo davanti ad un caminetto, dovrai guardare in alto, in alto, su per il camino e il mondo gelido dall’altra parte del muro. - Dai creatori di World of Goo e Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure - 100% indie: prodotto da tre ragazzi indipendenti, senza ufficio, publisher e finanziamenti - Senza pubblicità, spam o messaggi promozionali, solo il gioco!

NL.name: Little Inferno
NL.description: Gefeliciteerd met het aanschaffen van je nieuwe Little Inferno Entertainment Haard! Gooi je speeltjes in het vuur, en speel er mee terwijl ze branden. Blijf warm daarbinnen. Het sneeuwt al sinds mensenheugenis! Verbrand houtblokken, gillende robots, creditcards, batterijen, exploderende vissen, onstabiele nucleaire apparaten en kleine sterrenstelsels. Een avontuur dat zich bijna volledig voor een open haard afspeelt - over naar boven door de schoorsteen kijken en de koude wereld aan de andere zijde van die muur. - Van de ontwerpers van World of Goo en Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure - 100% indie - gemaakt door 3 jongens, zonder kantoor, zonder uitgevers, zonder geldsteun - Zonder IAP - geen spam of reclame. Enkel het spel.

Just the game.

RU.name: Little Inferno
RU.description: Гори, гори ясно, чтобы не погасло! Приглашаем вас поиграть и согреться у камина в Little Inferno Entertainment Fireplace. Бросайте игрушки в огонь и играйте, пока они полыхают. Так у вас есть какой-никакой шанс согреться. Снег валит целую вечность, и никто не знает, когда он прекратится. Поленья, визжащие роботы, кредитки, батарейки, взрывоопасная рыба, ядерные примочки и даже маленькие галактики — все это вам предстоит отправить в топку. Новое приключение берет свое начало здесь, у камина. А если устремить взгляд за клубами дыма, поднимающимися вверх по дымоходу, вы увидите странный мир, скованный холодом. - Новая игра от разработчиков World of Goo и Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure. - На 100% независимые разработчики: трое парней без офиса, никаких игровых издателей и раскрутки, никаких капиталовложений. - Никакого спама или рекламы. Наслаждайтесь игрой!

Congratulations on your new Little Inferno Entertainment Fireplace! Throw your toys into your fire, and play with them as they burn. Stay warm in there. It's been snowing for as long as anyone can remember! Burn flaming logs, screaming robots, credit cards, batteries, exploding fish, unstable nuclear devices and tiny galaxies. An adventure that takes place almost entirely in front of a fireplace - about looking up up up out of the chimney, and the cold world just on the other side of the wall. - From the designers of World of Goo and Henry Hatsworth in the Puzzling Adventure. - 100% indie - made by three guys with no office, no publishers and no funding. - IAP free - no spam, upselling or ads of any sort. Just the game.

SK.name: Little Inferno
SK.description: "A beautiful masterpiece", "inventive, moving and unrelentingly funny", "a deft statement on games and how we play them" - Little Inferno is an unusual game filled with surprise and wonder, and even better the less you know about it before playing.
